SELECT
FROM B_ORDER_ANALYZING WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND TO_DAYS(create_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW())

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(id) FROM b_order_details WHERE TO_DAYS(draw_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND dept_id = #{deptId} ) / ( SELECT COUNT(id) FROM b_order_details WHERE TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND dept_id = #{deptId} ) * 100 AS loanRatio

SELECT boa.id AS "id", boa.dept_id AS "deptId", sd.simple_name AS "simpleName", boa.contract_amount AS "contractAmount", boa.loan_amount AS "loanAmount", boa.loan_ratio AS "loanRatio", boa.create_date AS "createDate" FROM b_order_analyzing boa LEFT JOIN SYS_DEPT sd ON boa.dept_id = sd.dept_id WHERE TO_DAYS(create_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND boa.dept_id != 0 ORDER BY boa.contract_amount DESC LIMIT 0,7
